title: Get this discreet camera for just $61 during our Back To School Sale
description:
School is hard, and sometimes it’s nice to have an extra pair of eyes to help you understand a lesson. With the TOKK™ CAM C2+ Range of Smart WiFi Discreet Day/Night Vision Camera, you can record classes and watch them back later to make sure the message really sinks in. During our Back-to-School Sale, you can get this innovative tool for 32% off, plus free shipping, at just $60.99.

This portable, ultra-compact camera works on a Wi-Fi connection, instantly streaming or recording 1280x720p video to your smart device. You can wear it in class, use it as a security camera, or set it up as a dash camera in your car — it magnetically attaches to any metal surface and clips on just about anywhere else. With a built-in mic, you’ll pick up high-quality audio while you’re recording and night vision ensures you can get quality recordings at all times of day.

Give yourself a boost in the classroom. July 28th through August 13th, you can get the TOKK™ CAM C2+ Range of Smart WiFi Discreet Day/Night Vision Camera with free shipping for 32% off $89 at just $60.99.

Check out this deal and others included in the Back-to-School Collection, ending August 13 at 11:59 p.m. PT.

 

TOKK™ CAM C2+ Range of Smart WiFi Discreet Day/Night Vision Camera – $60.99

See Deal

Prices are subject to change.
